https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/w5bSVpGnqL2XDG22ddubcD9ik5U.jpg Mona Gray is a 20-year-old loner who, as a child, turned to math for salvation after her father became ill. As an adult, Mona now teaches the subject and must help her students through their own crises. An Invisible Sign
